childMarkdownRemark.html: The most popular wallet is now an extensible platform for permissionless innovation. Bring your features and APIs to MetaMask with Snaps.

node.headline: Build the wallet experience of the future

childMarkdownRemark.html: Build the wallet experience of the future

modules.title: Build the wallet experience of the future > Cards

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Blockchains

The multichain future is here. Go beyond Ethereum with snaps for any protocol.

Layer 2s

Integrate any scaling solution and make exploring Layer 2s accessible to everyone.

APIs

Connect your APIs and services to MetaMask in totally new ways.

Identity

Enable authentication, privacy, and consent in ways that keep users in control.

Security

Empower users with more ways to protect their data and employ anti-phishing solutions.

Your ideas

Extend and customize the web3 experience for your users.

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Security comes first

Snaps execute in a sandboxed environment based on Hardened JavaScript by Agoric. Snaps uses a permissions model for protecting user data and respecting user consent. Learn more.

Developer preview software

Snaps is pre-release software. To try Snaps, install MetaMask Flask, a canary distribution for developers that provides access to upcoming features.
